atlassian.description: Atlassian MCP server for Jira sprint management, backlog grooming, issue tracking, velocity metrics, burndown charts, and Confluence documentation publishing (meeting notes, charters, risk registers, dashboards).

slack.description: Slack MCP server for posting daily standups, 3P updates, blocker alerts, milestone notifications, and stakeholder communications.

google-calendar.description: Google Calendar MCP server for scheduling sprint ceremonies (planning, review, retro, standups), milestone due date tracking, and stakeholder review cadence management.
